SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Controller.Server

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Controller.Server.ServerController
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Controller.Server.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllerInterface, ServerControllerInterface
public class GameController extends ServerController
The GameController class extends the ServerController and manages the game state, handling player actions such as placing cards, picking objectives, and drawing from decks.

This class ensures synchronization and state management for the ongoing game.
